<ProgramListing>

<Link id="l00001" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===--- MisExpect.cpp - Check the use of llvm.expect with PGO data -------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00002" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00003" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Part of the LLVM Project, under the Apache License v2.0 with LLVM Exceptions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00004" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// See https://llvm.org/LICENSE.txt for license information.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00005" /><CodeLine lineNumber="5"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0 WITH LLVM-exception</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="6"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="7"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This contains code to emit warnings for potentially incorrect usage of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// llvm.expect intrinsic. This utility extracts the threshold values from</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// metadata associated with the instrumented Branch or Switch instruction. The</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// threshold values are then used to determine if a warning should be emmited.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// MisExpect&#39;s implementation relies on two assumptions about how branch weights</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// are managed in LLVM.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 1) Frontend profiling weights are always in place before llvm.expect is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// lowered in LowerExpectIntrinsic.cpp. Frontend based instrumentation therefore</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// needs to extract the branch weights and then compare them to the weights</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// being added by the llvm.expect intrinsic lowering.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 2) Sampling and IR based profiles will &#42;only&#42; have branch weight metadata</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// before profiling data is consulted if they are from a lowered llvm.expect</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// intrinsic. These profiles thus always extract the expected weights and then</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// compare them to the weights collected during profiling to determine if a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// diagnostic message is warranted.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/utils/misexpect-h">llvm/Transforms/Utils/MisExpect.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/twine-h">llvm/ADT/Twine.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/optimizationremarkemitter-h">llvm/Analysis/OptimizationRemarkEmitter.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/branchprobability-h">llvm/Support/BranchProbability.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/commandline-h">llvm/Support/CommandLine.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/formatvariadic-h">llvm/Support/FormatVariadic.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Ret = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;Instruction&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>-&gt;getCondition());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TODO: Find a way to resolve condition location for switches</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Using the condition of the switch seems to often resolve to an earlier</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// point in the program, i.e. the calculation of the switch condition, rather</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// than the switch&#39;s location in the source code. Thus, we should use the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instruction to get source code locations rather than the condition to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// improve diagnostic output, such as the caret. If the same problem exists</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// for branch instructions, then we should remove this function and directly</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// use the instruction</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;S = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;SwitchInst&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Ret = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;Instruction&gt;</a>(S-&gt;getCondition());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-misexpect-cpp-/#a2aa415fe106b04cb1941236bbca23edb"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-misexpect-cpp-/#a2aa415fe106b04cb1941236bbca23edb">emitMisexpectDiagnostic</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/llvmcontext">LLVMContext</a> &amp;Ctx,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlight">                             uint64&#95;t ProfCount, uint64&#95;t TotalCount) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">double</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PercentageCorrect = (double)ProfCount / TotalCount;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PerString =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a653cce37b80c03eebe7a00520a8eabb6">formatv</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;&#123;0:P&#125; (&#123;1&#125; / &#123;2&#125;)&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, PercentageCorrect, ProfCount, TotalCount);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> RemStr = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a653cce37b80c03eebe7a00520a8eabb6">formatv</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Potential performance regression from use of the llvm.expect intrinsic: &quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Annotation was correct on &#123;0&#125; of profiled executions.&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlight">      PerString);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/twine">Twine</a> Msg(PerString);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/riscvredundantcopyelimination-cpp/#a193847098793cdbab306803186676899">Cond</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-misexpect-cpp-/#a9b8415aeb5fa30b15e33104b0123564f">getInstCondition</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-misexpect-cpp-/#a10d9ea39cfa347a270e20536d09732e0">isMisExpectDiagEnabled</a>(Ctx))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Ctx.diagnose(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/diagnosticinfomisexpect">DiagnosticInfoMisExpect</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/riscvredundantcopyelimination-cpp/#a193847098793cdbab306803186676899">Cond</a>, Msg));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/optimizationremarkemitter">OptimizationRemarkEmitter</a> ORE(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;getParent()-&gt;getParent());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlight">  ORE.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/optimizationremarkemitter/#aae6a98aea85aa3af87357cc5448db499">emit</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/optimizationremark">OptimizationRemark</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/genericcycleimpl-h/#ad78e062f62e0d6e453941fb4ca843e4d">DEBUG&#95;TYPE</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;misexpect&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/riscvredundantcopyelimination-cpp/#a193847098793cdbab306803186676899">Cond</a>) &lt;&lt; RemStr.str());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// namespace</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">namespace </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm">llvm</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">namespace </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/misexpect">misexpect</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/misexpect/#a8677c5d2618fcf52eda43f5530decb6b"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/misexpect/#a8677c5d2618fcf52eda43f5530decb6b">verifyMisExpect</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;uint32&#95;t&gt;</a> RealWeights,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlight">                     <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;uint32&#95;t&gt;</a> ExpectedWeights) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// To determine if we emit a diagnostic, we need to compare the branch weights</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// from the profile to those added by the llvm.expect intrinsic.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// So first, we extract the &quot;likely&quot; and &quot;unlikely&quot; weights from</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ExpectedWeights And determine the correct weight in the profile to compare</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// against.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/lowerexpectintrinsic-cpp/#aae93c90b6047163d33af8cc1bd57a193">LikelyBranchWeight</a> = 0,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlight">           <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/lowerexpectintrinsic-cpp/#a351a1280d0bfece4f72e806eba12d284">UnlikelyBranchWeight</a> = std::numeric&#95;limits&lt;uint32&#95;t&gt;::max();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MaxIndex = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Idx = 0, End = ExpectedWeights.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref/#a85ffb6531d4cda988ea81f18d4e56fb7">size</a>(); Idx &lt; End; Idx++) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint32&#95;t V = ExpectedWeights&#91;Idx&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/lowerexpectintrinsic-cpp/#aae93c90b6047163d33af8cc1bd57a193">LikelyBranchWeight</a> &lt; V) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/lowerexpectintrinsic-cpp/#aae93c90b6047163d33af8cc1bd57a193">LikelyBranchWeight</a> = V;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlight">      MaxIndex = Idx;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/lowerexpectintrinsic-cpp/#a351a1280d0bfece4f72e806eba12d284">UnlikelyBranchWeight</a> &gt; V) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/lowerexpectintrinsic-cpp/#a351a1280d0bfece4f72e806eba12d284">UnlikelyBranchWeight</a> = V;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> uint64&#95;t ProfiledWeight = RealWeights&#91;MaxIndex&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> uint64&#95;t RealWeightsTotal =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlight">      std::accumulate(RealWeights.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref/#aab36927882fbfdcbb860d87fd9c30da8">begin</a>(), RealWeights.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref/#a7ca5197533a9c1fb8a2bd30587fcec6b">end</a>(), (uint64&#95;t)0,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlight">                      std::plus&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt;());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> uint64&#95;t NumUnlikelyTargets = RealWeights.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref/#a85ffb6531d4cda988ea81f18d4e56fb7">size</a>() - 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t TotalBranchWeight =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/lowerexpectintrinsic-cpp/#aae93c90b6047163d33af8cc1bd57a193">LikelyBranchWeight</a> + (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/lowerexpectintrinsic-cpp/#a351a1280d0bfece4f72e806eba12d284">UnlikelyBranchWeight</a> &#42; NumUnlikelyTargets);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Failing this assert means that we have corrupted metadata.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>((TotalBranchWeight &gt;= <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/lowerexpectintrinsic-cpp/#aae93c90b6047163d33af8cc1bd57a193">LikelyBranchWeight</a>) &amp;&amp; (TotalBranchWeight &gt; 0) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><span class="doxyHighlight">         </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;TotalBranchWeight is less than the Likely branch weight&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// To determine our threshold value we need to obtain the branch probability</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// for the weights added by llvm.expect and use that proportion to calculate</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// our threshold based on the collected profile data.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LikelyProbablilty = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchprobability/#a0333345669e75a54c7de3d5fe0f6e746">BranchProbability::getBranchProbability</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/lowerexpectintrinsic-cpp/#aae93c90b6047163d33af8cc1bd57a193">LikelyBranchWeight</a>, TotalBranchWeight);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t ScaledThreshold = LikelyProbablilty.scale(RealWeightsTotal);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// clamp tolerance range to &#91;0, 100)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Tolerance = getMisExpectTolerance(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>.getContext());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Tolerance = std::clamp(Tolerance, 0u, 99u);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Allow users to relax checking by N%  i.e., if they use a 5% tolerance,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// then we check against 0.95&#42;ScaledThreshold</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Tolerance &gt; 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ScaledThreshold &#42;= (1.0 - Tolerance / 100.0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// When the profile weight is below the threshold, we emit the diagnostic</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ProfiledWeight &lt; ScaledThreshold)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><span class="doxyHighlight">    emitMisexpectDiagnostic(&amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>.getContext(), ProfiledWeight,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><span class="doxyHighlight">                            RealWeightsTotal);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/misexpect/#a62ecd68a608ec120263975c279ae3dab"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/misexpect/#a62ecd68a608ec120263975c279ae3dab">checkBackendInstrumentation</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                 </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;uint32&#95;t&gt;</a> RealWeights) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Backend checking assumes any existing weight comes from an &#96;llvm.expect&#96;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// intrinsic. However, SampleProfiling + ThinLTO add branch weights  multiple</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// times, leading to an invalid assumption in our checking. Backend checks</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// should only operate on branch weights that carry the &quot;!expected&quot; field,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// since they are guaranteed to be added by the LowerExpectIntrinsic pass.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a4a3bd60427b33355559566bdec3c9f90">hasBranchWeightOrigin</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;uint32&#95;t&gt;</a> ExpectedWeights;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac19cbbc4935a23e1d44f65e1eaba6b1d">extractBranchWeights</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>, ExpectedWeights))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/misexpect/#a8677c5d2618fcf52eda43f5530decb6b">verifyMisExpect</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>, RealWeights, ExpectedWeights);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/misexpect/#a21de4796e674d8dabcea69242abe5005"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/misexpect/#a21de4796e674d8dabcea69242abe5005">checkFrontendInstrumentation</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;uint32&#95;t&gt;</a> ExpectedWeights) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;uint32&#95;t&gt;</a> RealWeights;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac19cbbc4935a23e1d44f65e1eaba6b1d">extractBranchWeights</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>, RealWeights))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/misexpect/#a8677c5d2618fcf52eda43f5530decb6b">verifyMisExpect</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>, RealWeights, ExpectedWeights);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
